title: Bloomberg Markets: Cakmak Sees $1 Trillion Valuation for Amazon
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Cakmak Sees $1 Trillion Valuation for Amazon
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010James Cakmak\u0010Equity Analyst\u0010Monness Crespi Hardt & Co \u0010Discussing Amazon 3rd-quarter earnings and why he calls the company a "tarin that can't be stopped."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
